description: Returns the status of the autoshift observer notification. Autoshift observer notifications notify you through Amazon EventBridge when there is an autoshift event for zonal autoshift. The status can be ENABLED or DISABLED. When ENABLED, a notification is sent when an autoshift is triggered. When DISABLED, notifications are not sent.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of autoshift observer notification. If the status is ENABLED, ARC includes all autoshift events when you use the Amazon EventBridge pattern Autoshift In Progress. When the status is DISABLED, ARC includes only autoshift events for autoshifts when one or more of your resources is included in the autoshift.
